meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ectoplasmic substance under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly figure had an eerie ectoplasmic glow.
meanings.sent3: The ectoplasmic mist seemed to dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her aura was as ethereal and ectoplasmic as a ghost.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid picture of the ectoplasmic world beyond.

meanings.sent1: The paranormal investigator found an ectoplasmic residue at the haunted house.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious fog had an ectoplasmic quality to it.
meanings.sent3: The cake frosting looked strangely ectoplasmic under the blacklight.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the forest felt ectoplasmic, as if ghosts were watching.
meanings.sent5: The movie special effects created a realistic ectoplasmic effect on screen.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the presence of ectoplasm.
meanings.sent1: The séance room had an ectoplasmic smell lingering in the air.
meanings.sent2: The old mansion was rumored to be ectoplasmic hotspot.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations gave the party an ectoplasmic vibe.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had an ectoplasmic aura that sent shivers down the spine.
meanings.sent5: The ghost hunter's equipment detected an ectoplasmic anomaly in the room.
